section.title: Currency: locale-dependent currency representation
section.p: Download some additional files required by the example:CommonFramework.zip
View the source code: browse. View the additional files: browse.
This example shows locale-dependent currency representation. The way currency values and symbols are printed depends on the locale's settings.

li.p: TLocale - Sets and gets the system's locale settings.
TCurrencySymbol - Gets a copy of the currency symbol(s) in use by the current locale.

section.p: The example requires no specific capabilities in order to run - and does not demonstrate any security issues.
